Class NeuralNetwork

  • java.lang.Object
    • NeuralNetwork

  • public class NeuralNetwork
extends java.lang.Object
    This is implementation of Neural Network with 2 hidden layers, total amount of layers is 4 (input layer - first hidden layer - second hidden layer - output layer)
    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    Kacper Kowalik

    • Method Summary

      Return derivative of activation function value for chosen x
      void calculateDeltasAndGradientsv2()
      This method calculates error of output neuron layer and backpropagates the error to the previous layers and makes Nodes weight correction

      ideal output - current output calculation
